title: RBI transfers less money than Finance Minister budgeted as dividend from the central bank - CNBCTV18
content: RBI transfers less money than Finance Minister budgeted as dividend from the central bank  CNBCTV18
description: "The board approved the transfer of Rs 30,307 crore as surplus while deciding to maintain the Contingency Risk Buffer at 5.50 percent," the RBI said in a statement.
